content: seattle spiral fingerless gloves pattern by knotalotgoingon materials needed ➔ ~115 yards of dk/worsted weight yarn ➔ size us 5 3 75mm dpns ➔ a short piece of waste yarn ➔ stitch markers x3 sizing & gauge adult size stretchy gauge of ~6 sts 8 row/in for knit sts no-sew | knit in the round beginner-friendly seattle spiral fingerless gloves - knotalotgoingon terminology and abbreviations c/o - cast on or cast off k - knit p - purl st/sts - stitch/stitches kfb - knit into the front and back of the same stitch pm - place marker sm - slip marker seed stitch - alternating row of k1p1 2x2 rib - repeated k2p2 pattern k1 p1 k1 p1 k4 x2 - knit two sets of the stitch sequence in the parentheses in this example knit one purl one knit one purl one knit four knit one purl one knit one purl one knit four dpn - double-pointed needle 48 - the number in brackets represents the number of stitches you should have after finishing a row pattern overview in case you want to know what you re getting into this glove is knit in the round on double-pointed needles it begins with knitting a 2x2 ribbed edge then a spiral pattern with alternating spirals of knit stitching and seed stitching and finally another edge of 2x2 ribbing after the main part of the glove is knit return to the stitches set aside for the thumb and work the thumb sleeve in knit stitch followed by more 2x2 ribbing the second glove is knit up the same as the first suggested potential adjustments based on feedback from test knitters you may wish to make the cuff the first 2x2 ribbing section and thumb ribbing shorter or longer depending on your preferences and hand size you may also wish to size up or down on needles/yarn weight to achieve gauge pattern cast on round 0 c/o 48 sts amongst three dpn 16 sts per dpn 48 join in the round being careful not to twist your work and place a stitch marker at the beginning of the round work the 2x2 rib rounds 1-12 k2 p2 around 48 create the spiral of stockinette stitch and seed stitch round 13 k4 p1 k1 p1 k1 x6 48 round 14 k5 p1 k1 p1 x6 48 round 15 k4 p1 k1 p1 k1 x6 48 same as row 13 round 16 k3 p1 k1 p1 k2 x6 48 same as row 13 shifted by one st round 17 k4 p1 k1 p1 k1 x6 48 same as row 14 shifted by one st round 18 k3 p1 k1 p1 k2 x6 48 same as row 16 1 seattle spiral fingerless gloves -
